pr_title: Corrected HTTP response code for Model version does not exists exception

timeline.bodyText: Should this be 'throw ModelVersionNotFoundException'? Also, let's keep only one class.
timeline.author: dhaniram-kshirsagar

replies.bodyText: InvalidModelVersionException for case where user tries to unregister the default version.
replies.author: harshbafna

timeline.bodyText: As per #196, it should be 404 and not 403. Why 403? Also, let's keep things simple i.e. Catch ModelVersionNotFound exception in NOT-FOUND if clause above instead of having base as illegalArgexception.
timeline.author: dhaniram-kshirsagar

timeline.bodyText: I think it should be NOT_FOUND as commented above.
timeline.author: dhaniram-kshirsagar

timeline.message: Added openapi missing responses. - incorporated review comments
updated method signature after resolving merge conflicts
